data.name: Globo.com e O Globo Dark Theme
data.description: Tema Dark para Globo.com e O Globo, incluindo Esportes, Época, Extra, Gshow, Quem, Blogs do oGlobo, TechTudo e mais.

data.name: Cursor - Black - KMV
data.description:
Black Cursors.

-Global.

Includes Pointer and Clicker (:hover + :active) - all base64 (non-url).

Code is provided to the Public Domain.
Feel free to copy, - (re-)distribute, edit &/or include it in your own Themes without asking.

Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html


For Black cursor without pointers;
https://userstyles.org/styles/185630/


The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

data.css:
/*
/*
/* i really want this to be global */
/* 
/* Cursor - Black - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Black Cursor only (no pointers):
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/185630/
/*
/* =============================
/* Code is in the Public domain.
/* Do with it what thou wilt.
/* =============================
/*
/* Stylus recommended:
/* https://add0n.com/stylus.html
/*
/* Other Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact:
/* https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
/*
*/

/* Main Cursor */

html,
body
{
  cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default;
}

/*Fullscreen Cursor Hide*/

[class*="fullscreen"] [class*="inactive"],
[class*="fullscreen"][class*="inactive"],
[class*="inactive"],
.jw-flag-fullscreen.jw-flag-user-inactive div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset div.jw-media.jw-reset video.jw-video.jw-reset,
.player.player-cursor-hide,
[style="cursor: none"],
.reddit-video-player-root::after,
.ytp-autohide
{
    cursor: none!important;
}

data.name: Cursor - Skyrim - KMV
data.description:
Skyrim Cursor by KMV.

Global.
32x32.

Includes two additional cursors; Black :hover and :active.
Integrated into CSS (base64) - No external mirror utilized.

Source:
1) https://tes-mods.fandom.com/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Mods_Wiki
2) https://images.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110213131405/elderscrolls/es/images/9/91/CursorSkyrim.png

For Skyrim Cursor only (without extra Pointers :hover & :active), see:
https://userstyles.org/styles/176290/

Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/

user.name: KMVerum
user.about:
/*

NOTICE:

All my Themes are designed for Stylus;
https://add0n.com/stylus.html

I stopped using Stylish in 2017 when the owner sold us out, and began selling user data:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/53233/announcement-to-the-community

Stylus became the fork of Stylish when this happened.

Stylish has since altered their code to the point where many old CSS standards aren't accepted anymore.
This is especially troublesome on Chrome.

As an example to this:
-My YouTube Dark Theme (as of Oct. 2019), consisted of 1459 lines and works fine in Stylus, but had 866 errors in Stylish.

The time and effort needed to correct all errors on an already working code is a no-go.
More importantly; Privacy is of much greater concern to me.

Description from Stylus website;
"Any and all analytics, telemetry, and data-collection have been removed completely."

PS; If you're on Firefox; They've done pretty much the same thing.
-Waterfox is the alternative;
https://www.waterfox.net/

My themes also work on Tor.

*/

data.name: Pure 百度 - 搜索/文库/知道/网盘/百科等多合一
data.description: ※简介：点击查看 ※交流： TG吹水群　Q群823737288 TG更新频道　RSS订阅（同步TG更新） ※写作说明： 好不好用自己用了才知道，6,600 行，183,413 字符，凝聚了多少个日夜的缠绵。 它涵盖了大量百度的网页，从登录框到按钮，从扁平到质感，升华了多少设计师前沿的灵感。 做出一款不管是强迫症，还是设计师，都能佩服舒心的主题，真的太难。 我曾多次尝试扁平与质感的平衡，大量留白的舒心，用色彩块代替繁琐和带强烈割据感的线条... 在一个被大众所摒弃的拟物化、随处可见的背景直接引用图片来简单模拟质感、改了大框架却连简 单的链接、输入框、按钮都没有一丝一毫的修改、到现在都很少用上字体图标、单调到甚至没有任 何动画、甚至推广满屏幕的陈旧的百度网页，搭建起一个全新的设计风格，这才是百度所应有的样 子，独具一格，简约而现代... 我使用了一些质感但不守旧的配色，轻简的质感阴影和鲜明的色块... 百度的每一款产品都在属于它们本身的独特设计风格上，反复优化统一。 ※完成进度： 已完成，欢迎体验。 ※样式应用情况： 支持百度以下产品： 搜索/文库/知道/网盘/百科/经验/翻译/地图/视频/新闻/学术/快照/糯米/风云榜/智能云/百家号/账 户安全/个人中心/网址导航/千千静听 ※版权说明： 绝大部分代码，都是自己在无数日夜下敲出来的，所以未经允许，不得二改二传。 它是免费的，任何人都不得以任何理由向其他人以不合法的方式收费。

data.name: CardMarket DarkMode
Lichess superzen
data.description:
When playing, enable this style to hide most information on screen, in addition to what zen mode already does.

This disables rating, user information, chat, and losing/winning streak, pretty much everything, even after the match is over.
